meanings.definition: A first-year student in high school, college, or university.
meanings.sent1: The freshmen were excited to start their first day of high school.
meanings.sent2: The freshmen attended orientation to get to know the campus.
meanings.sent3: The freshmen accidentally walked into the staff room thinking it was a classroom.
meanings.sent4: The freshmen were like young saplings, eager to grow and learn.
meanings.sent5: The freshmen formed study groups to help each other with their assignments.

meanings.sent1: The freshmen gathered in the cafeteria for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The freshmen received their class schedules for the semester.
meanings.sent3: The freshmen decided to all wear matching shirts on the first day of school.
meanings.sent4: The freshmen stood out in the crowd with their bright backpacks.
meanings.sent5: The freshmen cheered loudly at the pep rally to show their school spirit.
